mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RENT_BOOK VALUES(SEQ_RENT_BOOK_NO.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo}, #{bookNo}, SYSDATE, DEFAULT)
mapper.select: SELECT BOOK_TITLE, AUTHOR_LAST_NAME , AUTHOR_FIRST_NAME , BOOK_PUBLISHER , BOOK_YEAR , BOOK_IMG , BOOK_TMI, BOOK_NO FROM RENT_BOOK RB LEFT JOIN BOOK_INFO BI USING(BOOK_NO) WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND RENT_BOOK_CHECK = 1 ORDER BY BOOK_RESERVE
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RENT_BOOK WHERE MEMBER_NO = #{memberNo} AND RENT_BOOK_CHECK = 1
